text: læa meux thuk klaw kæ phwk khea wa cng xyu nı meuxng ni theid læa cng briphokh cak meuxng nan n thi dı kdi thi phwk cea prasngkh læa cng klaw wa hitteaahˌ læa cng khea pratu nan pi nı sphaph phu nom sirsʹa lng dwy khwam nxbnxm rea k ca xphaythosʹ hı kæ phwk cea sung brrda khwam phid khxng phwk cea læa rea ca pheimphun kæ brrda phu kratha khwam di
